name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"db8d21d9-14d5-4ffb-92c3-59fd47504a46","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_graph","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"348446b1-bb23-416f-a87b-1699823dce76","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_graph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs the FASTEN call graph representation for the analyzed package. It processes call edges produced by the analysis phase and separates them into internal and external calls based on the origin of the destination namespace.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8628b2c2-821b-46d1-92c3-40ce4577bf8f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"All call endpoints are resolved into FASTEN-compatible identifiers, using numeric namespace identifiers for internal code and URI-based identifiers for external references.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2ba0192a-420e-4ad5-abae-eff4454eb0a6","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"c5bc160d-ed61-47e0-ab36-ad8037a5fc85","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary purpose of this function is to encode behavioral relationships between code elements in a form that conforms to the FASTEN schema. By distinguishing internal calls from external dependency calls, it enables precise analysis of coupling and dependency usage.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b348734c-0743-47ba-918d-57b108628550","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7e302700-1eaa-4b7d-a46e-67c40f30fd13","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Detailed invoked, the function performs the following format:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"949fdfa5-d535-4a19-8e04-268a59e5c58d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"internalCalls","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":

A list of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[source_id, destination_id]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pairs, where both endpoints are internal namespace identifiers.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e3ca9af6-b760-4682-af4a-7c915b2ac3ed","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"externalCalls","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":

A list of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"[source_id, external_uri]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" pairs, where the destination refers to an external dependency.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8119f1fe-75d6-4e44-b752-4abc4b7cbc37","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"fed7f169-0e3d-4759-84db-b0319f07f1d3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role in FASTEN Generation","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3838ed33-e6e0-45aa-9b79-85e9deb7eeaa","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"get_graph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides the behavioral dimension of the FASTEN output. Its results complement structural artifacts such as modules and class hierarchies, enabling comprehensive analysis of how code elements interact at runtime.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cd8a585a-bca2-47a7-aa0d-360f17269a40","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"9debc9f3-c6a0-4863-86c1-866475b4081c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Considerations","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"53e9c12c-2d20-47a8-bed0-bb919fdc689b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Efficient namespace resolution via precomputed lookup maps","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"94252a23-ec37-4376-84a0-779ccba1c665","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clear separation between internal and external calls","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f56384e6-0812-468d-9580-887273fe250d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Graceful handling of unresolved or incomplete edges","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4d8dc645-0654-47c5-8481-b3021937e25b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Alignment with FASTEN’s call graph representation requirements","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d4ec7cee-2fa7-4bb4-a38c-263681d57b91","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"9e70198a-25e3-4c03-9cc8-86635db43283","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
